title: Lol problem!!!!!
body: hey guts im having a problem with lol right now. Every time i try to update it loads up to 70-85% and my kbps drops to zero even though im connected to the internet with an etheral cable plz help

replies.body: [Try this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#jwq4). I had that exact same problem and this solution worked. League doesn't like automatic DNS addresses it seems. Just remember, it could stuff up other programs, so be ready to set it back.
